title: Santa Claus: the movie
creator_credit: Jeannot Szwarc, Ilya Salkind, Alexander Salkind and Alexander Salkind Productions
brief_description: A live action film about Santa Claus, his elves and how one nasty rich man attempts to stop Christmas. The elves leave the Arctic to join Santa’s fight to bring back Christmas to all the children of the world. With Dudley Moore and John Lithgow.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeannot Szwarc, Ilya Salkind, Alexander Salkind and Alexander Salkind Productions
